DOC.detailed_description: Sevoflurane propofol two basic drug maintenance anaesthesia . In study compare perioperative hemodynamic parameter , recovery profile cost containment sevoflurane propofol base general anaesthesia otorhinolaryngeal surgery . Patients equally divide four anaesthetic subgroup . In group A C anaesthesia base sevoflurane propofol , respectively , without bispectral index ( BIS ) train-of-for monitor ( TOF ) monitoring . In group B D anaesthesia base sevoflurane propofol , respectively , BIS TOF monitoring . Drug consumption , recovery profile anaesthesia cost analyse . ECG , main arterial pressure ( MAP ) , heart rate , oxygen saturation peripheral haemoglobin ( SpO2 ) , pressure end-tidal carbon dioxide monitor continuously registered 5 min interval anaesthesia . Each group receive propofol anaesthesia induction . In group A B anaesthesia maintain sevoflurane , group C D propofol . In group B D depth anaesthesia ( BIS® Quatro Brain Monitoring Sensor , Covidien ) neuromuscular block status ( Infinity® , Trident® NMT SmartPod® , Dräger Medical ) monitor . BIS TOF value record 5 min interval .
